data.description:
"Death Game Hotel" offers a thrilling VR gaming experience where players wager not just chips, but their body parts in a high-stakes survival game. This unique game spans both single and multiplayer modes, inviting players into a world of strategic gambling and visceral competition.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322598_982821540301887_2728995575348650106_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8rkyJDkNIr4Q7kNvgGIn7AH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AMGEeecDK_VatLdI_xDQAT0&oh=00_AYAG75OcwiBWR3ujqKw6lj6Ng4leiYT5Ai_H35xWojWlFg&oe=66E42539)





In single-player mode, you're thrust into "Death Game 2000," where you must battle against quirky foes for survival.
{485868203936572}

Multiplayer mode raises the stakes, allowing players to create deadly games and compete against others globally.


Goblet of the Reaper:
A game of strategy where players must drop tiles into a blood-filled goblet and keep it from overflowing. The first to empty their hand without causing a goblet to overflow wins. One overflow extinguishes a Reaper Candle. When all are extinguished, the Reaper descends for one final deathmatch.
{1396390777713095}


Death Poker:
This adds a new "death" suit to traditional poker that trumps all the other suits. Players can raise the stakes even further by betting their body parts!
{1232168137942699}

changelog.change_log:
The following bugs have been fixed.
Fixed a problem in which the chips were not reflected correctly when exiting the game room after playing Death Poker.

Update Details
The following bugs have been fixed.
- Fixed a bug that prevented the next game from progressing if one of the players left the room while the game was in progress in multiplayer mode.

Update Details
The following new features, game adjustments, and bug fixes have been added.
-The right stick can be used to grab items away from you by pressing the bottom of the right stick.
-Cards can be flipped by pinch operation.
-A marker will appear when a player has the universal menu open.
-A player who is away from the game will be marked as being away from the game.
-Fixed a bug that the goblet selection laser was bent.
-The background resolution of the Japanese room has been adjusted.
-Fixed a bug in the display priority order of UI and HUD.
-Fixed a bug in the table setup of Goblet the reaper's that prevented more than four goblet of the same capacity from being displayed.
-Adjusted the volume of the clock of the login bonus.
-The consumption speed of soap bubbles has been adjusted.
-The consumption speed of combustion items such as cigarettes has been adjusted.
-The actions of inhaling and exhaling cigarettes items have been adjusted.
-The reroll of the death poker cheat "Sleight of Hand" has been eliminated.
-Adjusted the speed of tip movement.
-Adjusted volume setting of default BGM and SE.
-Added a product that can be purchased in bulk: cola, beer, and cappuccino.
-Fixed a draw judgment error when a player was FOLD when activating Trap.
